Biology: Classical neuroendocrine, high DLL3, MYC-driven proliferation
Key_Vulnerabilities: DLL3 surface expression → Rovalpituzumab tesirine (Rova-T); BCL2 overexpression → BCL2 inhibitors (venetoclax); Aurora kinase dependency → AURKA inhibitors (alisertib)

Biology: Neuroendocrine variant, MYCN amplification, neural differentiation
Key_Vulnerabilities: MYCN amplification → Aurora kinase inhibitors; MYC/MYCN dependency → BET inhibitors (JQ1); IGF1R signaling → IGF1R inhibitors
IGF1R overexpression → IGF1R inhibitors; FGFR1 amplification → FGFR inhibitors (erdafitinib); Notch pathway active → Notch inhibitors

Biology: Low neuroendocrine, high immune infiltration, T-cell inflamed
Key_Vulnerabilities: High PD-L1/PD-L2 → Immune checkpoint inhibitors; T-cell infiltration → Enhance with anti-CTLA4; IFN-γ signature → Biomarker for IO response
